abstract: As part of its international expansion plans, the state-owned China Development Bank has reached strategic agreements with K.K.R., TPG Capital and Permira.
snippet: As part of its international expansion plans, the state-owned China Development Bank has reached strategic agreements with K.K.R., TPG Capital and Permira.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — The state-owned China Development Bank announced strategic agreements on Tuesday with the private equity firms K.K.R., TPG Capital and Permira as it continued its international expansion.

headline.main: Chinese Bank Pairs Up With Private Equity
